content.text: SNIPER: g-pass - Advanced Hybrid Password Generator

text: [bold]g-pass[/] is a powerful password generator built on a hybrid C++/Python architecture.
It combines the raw speed of [bold cyan]C++[/] for high-performance permutation in [bold]Crunch Mode[/] with the
intelligence of [bold yellow]Python[/] for Smart Mode and advanced file handling.
[green]-i, --interactive[/]         Launch an interactive wizard to configure generation.
[green]--smart "<prompt>"[/]       Generate a password based on a text description (e.g., "a strong wifi password").
[green]-p, --preset <name>[/]        Use a predefined template for common scenarios.
[dim]Presets available: [cyan]human, email, wifi, random[/][/]
[green]-l, --length <N>[/]           Set password length (default: 16).
[green]-n, --count <N>[/]            Generate N passwords (default: 1).
[green]-e, --exclude <chars>[/]      Exclude specific characters (e.g., "Il1O0").
[green]--no-lower[/]                 Exclude lowercase letters.
[green]--no-upper[/]                 Exclude uppercase letters.
[green]--no-numbers[/]               Exclude numbers.
[green]--no-symbols[/]               Exclude symbols.
[green]--unicode[/]                  Include a sample of Unicode characters.
[green]--crunch <min> <max> <charset>[/] Generate all combinations from a charset.
[dim]Example: --crunch 3 4 abc1[/]
[green]--crunch-pattern <pattern>[/]  Generate combinations based on a pattern.
[dim]Placeholders: [cyan]@[/](lower), [cyan],[/](upper), [cyan]%[/](num), [cyan]^[/](symbol)[/]
[dim]Example: --crunch-pattern 'PASS-@@%%'[/]
[green]--save <FILE>[/]               Save passwords to a file ([cyan]txt, json, csv[/]).
[green]--split-size <SIZE>[/]         Automatically split large output files from Crunch Mode.
[dim]Example: 100M, 2G, 512K[/]
[green]-c, --copy[/]                  Copy the first generated password to the clipboard.
[#] Generate a 20-char password without symbols and copy it:
[yellow]g-pass -l 20 --no-symbols -c[/]
[#] Use the 'human' preset for a memorable passphrase:
[yellow]g-pass -p human[/]
[#] Let the AI create a password for a secure context:
[yellow]g-pass --smart "a very strong password for my crypto wallet"[/]
[#] Run crunch mode to generate all 4-digit PINs and save to a file:
[yellow]g-pass --crunch 4 4 0123456789 --save pins.txt[/]
[#] Create a wordlist based on a pattern and split it into 50MB files:
[yellow]g-pass --crunch-pattern 'user-@@%%' --save wordlist.txt --split-size 50M[/]
